ModMetaData.name: DocWorld
ModMetaData.author: Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description:
A mod of combined patches for my RimWorld mod collection "The Doctor's World". There are a lot of patches done to the various mods outlined in the "Changelog" in the "About" folder. I suggest you read there or GitHub for detailed information.
The basics are: mod moves items to new tabs and organizes layout, balances some recipes for various items, enhances minaturisation abilities, improves inter-mod compatability.
Credits: Lanilor- for helping me learn xpath patching on the Discord. Mehni- for his time and patience on the Discord. NotFood- for showing the way of the dragon. Sunlace- for hidden conduit idea. Yehn- for helping with xml codes on the Discord. Architect Textures- Smartline, eucalyp, and free pics @ https://www.flaticon.com/ Of course all the beautiful mod creators without whom this patch wouldn't do anything.
